Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
  Geometry

public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object

This class recieves the input from the driver to calculate the area of four different shapes using static methods, then returns the results to the driver.

Version:
1.0, October 11th 2014
Author:
Raymond Ferrell
